risks.title: Delay in integration with legacy CRM
risks.detail: Integration might be delayed because their team is short-staffed.
risks.mitigation: Monitor staffing levels and explore additional resources if necessary.

risks.title: Potential rework due to compliance changes
risks.detail: If compliance changes the KYC rules again, the form fields may need to be reworked.
risks.mitigation: Stay updated on compliance changes and prepare for necessary adjustments.

assumptions.title: Document upload method
assumptions.detail: Clients will upload documents via the new portal instead of email.

issues.title: Duplicate records and delays
issues.detail: Current manual process is causing duplicate records and delays.
issues.next_step: Investigate automation solutions to reduce manual errors.

dependencies.title: External vendor for address verification
dependencies.detail: Dependency on the external vendor for address verification API.
